# [Interview #979: Reddit AMA 2013, Entry #58](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=979#58)

#### [Shadowsaber223Â ()](http://www.reddit.com/r/Fantasy/comments/1ced7z/iamstilla_novelist_named_brandon_sanderson_ama/c9fs0ea?context=3)

Were any of the other magic systems of Sel affected by the fall of Elantris, such as soulforging?

#### Brandon Sanderson

No.
